xdevcfg_g.c File Reference

#include "xdevcfg.h"
#include "xparameters.h"

Variables

XDcfg_Config XDcfg_ConfigTable [1]

Detailed Description

This file contains a table that specifies the configuration of the Device Configuration Interface device in the system. Each device should have an entry in the table.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:
 Ver   Who Date     Changes
 ----- --- -------- ---------------------------------------------
 1.00a hvm 02/07/11 First release

Variable Documentation

XDcfg_Config XDcfg_ConfigTable[1]
Initial value:
 {
        {
                XPAR_XDCFG_0_DEVICE_ID,
                XPAR_XDCFG_0_BASEADDR,
        }
}

This table contains configuration information for each Device Config Interface instance in the system.
